#define PushSegmentStack ( up,
left,
right,
delta   ) 

Value:

{ \
  if (s >= (segment_stack+MaxStacksize)) \
    ThrowBinaryException(DrawError,"SegmentStackOverflow",image->filename) \
  else \
    { \
      if ((((up)+(delta)) >= 0) && (((up)+(delta)) < (long) image->rows)) \
        { \
          s->x1=(double) (left); \
          s->y1=(double) (up); \
          s->x2=(double) (right); \
          s->y2=(double) (delta); \
          s++; \
        } \
    } \
}
